casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Lynn GORDON. No. 132P11-8. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Gregory Lynn Gordon, Taylorsville, for Gordon, Gregory Lynn. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of September 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
